projects.about: A retail enterprise solution, which offers variety of plans to retailers. End users can see top customers based on region, any customers can upgrade or downgrade their plan.  Customers will be awarded based on their purchase.
projects.technologies: Java, Hibrenet, Ajax, Javascript, AngularJS, SQL

projects.about: A word guessing game in different categories.Dashboard can be viewed according to different filters such as total score, region, categoty etc.
A web application to take aptitude test in different domains. A insitute can also conduct tests for its student
